title: 262: CHATTY BROS: Confessions, Larping, & ARod
itunes:title: 262: CHATTY BROS: Confessions, Larping, & ARod
description:
Friday means its time for The Bros! Join Grayston and Evan as they confront Arod, Grayston plugs more businesses and gives Evan a special gift, The Bro’s read through some of the #broadsquads confessions, they discuss Grayston’s larping and how Evan’s imagination was destroyed, and a whollleee lot more!

 

FOLLOW THE CHATTY BROS HERE: 

Grayston: https://www.instagram.com/pipyopi/

Evan: https://www.instagram.com/trippersounds/

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS: 

***FAB FIT FUN: use coupon code CHATTY21 for $10 off your first box at WWW.FABFITFUN.COM

***NUTS.COM: Get free shipping on your first order when you text CHATTY to 64-000

***QUINCE: To get 50-80% off top-of-the-line clothing and home goods, PLUS free shipping, text BROADS to 64-000

***HAPPY DANCE: Get 15% off your first order at DOAHAPPYDANCE.COM/CHATTY

 

FOLLOW CHATTY BROADS:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chattybroads/

Bekah: https://www.instagram.com/bekah/

Jess: https://www.instagram.com/thebaddmom/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
